record.jsxtip: Fires after the user clicks this tab or when this tab is made active within its parent tabbed pane due to user interaction.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this tab is made active within its parent tabbed pane.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this tab is made inactive within its parent tabbed pane.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this tab and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this tab is removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this tab before it is removed from the DOM.
